          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring voltage across a light bulb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messende Spannung über einer Glühlampe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tension de mesure à travers une ampoule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tensão de medição através de um bulbo claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tensione di misurazione attraverso una lampadina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της τάσης πέρα από έναν ελαφρύ βολβό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Voltaje que mide a través de una bombilla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how a voltmeter is connected to a circuit to measure the voltage across the light bulb.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">batteries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Measurement</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltmeters</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie ein Voltmeter
an einen Stromkreis angeschlossen wird, um die Spannung über der 
Glühlampe zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment un voltmètre est 
relié à un circuit pour mesurer la tension à travers l'ampoule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como um voltímetro é 
conectado a um circuito para medir a tensão através do bulbo claro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come un voltmetro è 
collegato ad un circuito per misurare la tensione attraverso la 
lampadina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς ένα βολτόμετρο 
συνδέεται με ένα κύκλωμα για να μετρήσει την τάση πέρα από τον 
ελαφρύ βολβό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo un voltímetro está 
conectado con un circuito para medir el voltaje a través de la 
bombilla.</string>
          </description>
